1: וְהָרָעָ֖ב <sup>7458 </sup> <n>And the famine</n> כָּבֵ֥ד <sup>3515 </sup> <n>[was] sore</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n>
2: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> כִּלּוּ֙ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>had finished</n> לֶאֱכֹ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>eating</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשֶּׁ֔בֶר <sup>7668 </sup> <n>the corn</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> הֵבִ֖יאוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>which they had brought out</n> מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>their father</n> שֻׁ֖בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>unto them Go again</n> שִׁבְרוּ־ <sup>7666 </sup> <n>buy</n> לָ֥נוּ מְעַט־ <sup>4592 </sup> <n>us a little</n> אֹֽכֶל׃ <sup>400 </sup> <n>food</n>
3: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>spake</n> אֵלָ֛יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוּדָ֖ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And Judah</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto him saying</n> הָעֵ֣ד <sup>5749 </sup> <n>did solemnly</n> הֵעִד֩ <sup>5749 </sup> <n>protest</n> בָּ֨נוּ הָאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>The man</n> לֵאמֹר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto us saying</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>Ye shall not see</n> פָנַ֔י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> בִּלְתִּ֖י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>except</n> אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>your brother</n> אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
4: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> יֶשְׁךָ֛ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>If thou wilt</n> מְשַׁלֵּ֥חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>send</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אָחִ֖ינוּ <sup>251 </sup> <n>our brother</n> אִתָּ֑נוּ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> נֵרְדָ֕ה <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with us we will go down</n> וְנִשְׁבְּרָ֥ה <sup>7666 </sup> <n>and buy</n> לְךָ֖ אֹֽכֶל׃ <sup>400 </sup> <n>thee food</n>
5: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> אֵינְךָ֥ <sup>369 </sup> <n>not</n> מְשַׁלֵּ֖חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>But if thou wilt not send</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>we will not</n> נֵרֵ֑ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>[him] we will not go down</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָאִ֞ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>for the man</n> אָמַ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>You will not</n> תִרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>unto us Ye shall not see</n> פָנַ֔י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n> בִּלְתִּ֖י <sup>1115 </sup> <n>unless</n> אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>except your brother</n> אִתְּכֶֽם׃ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n>
6: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> לָמָ֥ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> הֲרֵעֹתֶ֖ם <sup>7489 </sup> <n>Wherefore dealt ye [so] ill</n> לִ֑י לְהַגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>with me [as] to tell</n> לָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> הַע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> לָכֶ֖ם אָֽח׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>they</n>
7: וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they said</n> שָׁא֣וֹל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>asked</n> שָֽׁאַל־ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>us straitly</n> הָ֠אִישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>The man</n> לָ֣נוּ וּלְמֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֜נוּ <sup>4138 </sup> <n>of our state and of our kindred</n> לֵאמֹ֗ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> הַע֨וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>[Is] your father</n> חַי֙ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>age</n> הֲיֵ֣שׁ <sup>3426 </sup> <n>there are</n> לָכֶ֣ם אָ֔ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>your brother</n> וַנַ֨גֶּד־ <sup>5046 </sup> <n>bewray</n> ל֔וֹ עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>him according</n> פִּ֖י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>to the tenor</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>of these words</n> הָאֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>we</n> הֲיָד֣וֹעַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>could we certainly</n> נֵדַ֔ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>know</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>would</n> יֹאמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that he would say</n> הוֹרִ֖ידוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>down</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחִיכֶֽם׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>your brother</n>
8: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוּדָ֜ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>And Judah</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>unto</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto Israel</n> אָבִ֗יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>his father</n> שִׁלְחָ֥ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Send</n> הַנַּ֛עַר <sup>5288 </sup> <n>the lad</n> אִתִּ֖י <sup>854 </sup> <n>and we</n> וְנָק֣וּמָה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>with me and we will arise</n> וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and go</n> וְנִֽחְיֶה֙ <sup>2421 </sup> <n>that we may live</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> נָמ֔וּת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>and not die</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>well</n> אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> גַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>well</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>well</n> טַפֵּֽנוּ׃ <sup>2945 </sup> <n>both we and thou [and] also our little ones</n>
9: אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>myself</n> אֶֽעֶרְבֶ֔נּוּ <sup>6148 </sup> <n>I will be surety</n> מִיָּדִ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>for him of my hand</n> תְּבַקְשֶׁ֑נּוּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>shalt thou require</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>him not</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הֲבִיאֹתִ֤יו <sup>935 </sup> <n>I bring</n> אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> וְהִצַּגְתִּ֣יו <sup>3322 </sup> <n>unto thee and set</n> לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>him before thee</n> וְחָטָ֥אתִֽי <sup>2398 </sup> <n>then let me bear the blame</n> לְךָ֖ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for</n> הַיָּמִֽים׃ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
10: כִּ֖י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>surely</n> לוּלֵ֣א <sup>3884 </sup> <n>For except</n> הִתְמַהְמָ֑הְנוּ <sup>4102 </sup> <n>we had lingered</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>surely</n> עַתָּ֥ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> שַׁ֖בְנוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>surely now we had returned</n> זֶ֥ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>he</n> פַעֲמָֽיִם׃ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>this second time</n>
11: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>And their father</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> כֵּ֣ן ׀ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> אֵפוֹא֮ <sup>645 </sup> <n>unto them If [it must be] so now</n> זֹ֣את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> עֲשׂוּ֒ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>do</n> קְח֞וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>this take</n> מִזִּמְרַ֤ת <sup>2173 </sup> <n>of the best fruits</n> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>3627 </sup> <n>in your vessels</n> וְהוֹרִ֥ידוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and carry down</n> לָאִ֖ישׁ <sup>582 </sup> <n>as</n> מִנְחָ֑ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>a present</n> מְעַ֤ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>a little</n> צֳרִי֙ <sup>6875 </sup> <n>balm</n> וּמְעַ֣ט <sup>4592 </sup> <n>and a little</n> דְּבַ֔שׁ <sup>1706 </sup> <n>honey</n> נְכֹ֣את <sup>5219 </sup> <n>spices</n> וָלֹ֔ט <sup>3910 </sup> <n>and myrrh</n> בָּטְנִ֖ים <sup>992 </sup> <n>nuts</n> וּשְׁקֵדִֽים׃ <sup>8247 </sup> <n>and almonds</n>
12: וְכֶ֥סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> מִשְׁנֶ֖ה <sup>4932 </sup> <n>double</n> קְח֣וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>And take</n> בְיֶדְכֶ֑ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in your hand</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַכֶּ֜סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and the money</n> הַמּוּשָׁ֨ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that was brought again</n> בְּפִ֤י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>in the mouth</n> אַמְתְּחֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <sup>572 </sup> <n>of your sacks</n> תָּשִׁ֣יבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>carry [it] again</n> בְיֶדְכֶ֔ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in your hand</n> אוּלַ֥י <sup>194 </sup> <n>perhaps</n> מִשְׁגֶּ֖ה <sup>4870 </sup> <n>peradventure it [was] an oversight</n> הֽוּא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n>
13: וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחִיכֶ֖ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>also your brother</n> קָ֑חוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Take</n> וְק֖וּמוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and arise</n> שׁ֥וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>go again</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאִֽישׁ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto the man</n>
14: וְאֵ֣ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>And God</n> שַׁדַּ֗י <sup>7706 </sup> <n>Almighty</n> יִתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>give</n> לָכֶ֤ם רַחֲמִים֙ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>you mercy</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the man</n> וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>that he may send away</n> לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲחִיכֶ֥ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>brother</n> אַחֵ֖ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>your other</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְיָמִ֑ין <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> וַאֲנִ֕י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>If</n> שָׁכֹ֖לְתִּי <sup>7921 </sup> <n>I be bereaved</n> שָׁכָֽלְתִּי׃ <sup>7921 </sup> <n>[of my children] I am bereaved</n>
15: וַיִּקְח֤וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>took</n> הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּנְחָ֣ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>present</n> הַזֹּ֔את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>that</n> וּמִשְׁנֶה־ <sup>4932 </sup> <n>double</n> כֶּ֛סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> לָקְח֥וּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and they took</n> בְיָדָ֖ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in their hand</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>and Benjamin</n> וַיָּקֻ֙מוּ֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and rose up</n> וַיֵּרְד֣וּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and went down</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <sup>5975 </sup> <n>and stood</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> יוֹסֵֽף׃ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n>
16: וַיַּ֨רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> יוֹסֵ֣ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And when Joseph</n> אִתָּם֮ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְיָמִין֒ <sup>1144 </sup> <n>Benjamin</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>them he said</n> לַֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> בֵּית֔וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the ruler of his house</n> הָבֵ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>Bring</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>[these] men</n> הַבָּ֑יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>home</n> וּטְבֹ֤חַ <sup>2873 </sup> <n>and slay</n> טֶ֙בַח֙ <sup>2874 </sup> <n>an animal</n> וְהָכֵ֔ן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>and make ready</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִתִּ֛י <sup>854 </sup> <n>are to</n> יֹאכְל֥וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>shall dine</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>for [these] men</n> בַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <sup>6672 </sup> <n>with me at noon</n>
17: וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>bade</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>as Joseph</n> וַיָּבֵ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>brought</n> הָאִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and the man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> בֵּ֥יתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> יוֹסֵֽף׃ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>into Joseph's</n>
18: וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>were afraid</n> הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>now the men</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> הֽוּבְאוּ֮ <sup>935 </sup> <n>because they were brought</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> יוֹסֵף֒ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>into Joseph's</n> וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and they said</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> דְּבַ֤ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Because</n> הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>of the money</n> הַשָּׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>that was returned</n> בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>572 </sup> <n>in our sacks</n> בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <sup>8462 </sup> <n>at the first time</n> אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <sup>587 </sup> <n>we</n> מֽוּבָאִ֑ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>are we brought in</n> לְהִתְגֹּלֵ֤ל <sup>1556 </sup> <n>that he may seek occasion</n> עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וּלְהִתְנַפֵּ֣ל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>against us and fall</n> עָלֵ֔ינוּ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> וְלָקַ֧חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>upon us and take</n> אֹתָ֛נוּ <sup>853 </sup> לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <sup>5650 </sup> <n>us for bondmen</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> חֲמֹרֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>and our asses</n>
19: וַֽיִּגְּשׁוּ֙ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>And they came near</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>to the steward</n> אֲשֶׁ֖ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>of Joseph's</n> וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and they communed</n> אֵלָ֖יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> פֶּ֥תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>with him at the door</n> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n>
20: וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> בִּ֣י <sup>994 </sup> <n>O</n> אֲדֹנִ֑י <sup>113 </sup> <n>sir</n> יָרֹ֥ד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>we came indeed</n> יָרַ֛דְנוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>down</n> בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <sup>8462 </sup> <n>at the first time</n> לִשְׁבָּר־ <sup>7666 </sup> <n>to buy</n> אֹֽכֶל׃ <sup>400 </sup> <n>food</n>
21: וַֽיְהִ֞י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> בָ֣אנוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when we came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמָּל֗וֹן <sup>4411 </sup> <n>to the inn</n> וַֽנִּפְתְּחָה֙ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>that we opened</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַמְתְּחֹתֵ֔ינוּ <sup>572 </sup> <n>our sacks</n> וְהִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> כֶֽסֶף־ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> אִישׁ֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and behold [every] man's</n> בְּפִ֣י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[was] in the mouth</n> אַמְתַּחְתּ֔וֹ <sup>572 </sup> <n>of his sack</n> כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>our money</n> בְּמִשְׁקָל֑וֹ <sup>4948 </sup> <n>in full weight</n> וַנָּ֥שֶׁב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and we have brought it again</n> אֹת֖וֹ <sup>853 </sup> בְּיָדֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in our hand</n>
22: וְכֶ֧סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> אַחֵ֛ר <sup>312 </sup> <n>And other</n> הוֹרַ֥דְנוּ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>have we brought down</n> בְיָדֵ֖נוּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in our hands</n> לִשְׁבָּר־ <sup>7666 </sup> <n>to buy</n> אֹ֑כֶל <sup>400 </sup> <n>food</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדַ֔עְנוּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>we cannot tell</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> שָׂ֥ם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>who put</n> כַּסְפֵּ֖נוּ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>our money</n> בְּאַמְתְּחֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>572 </sup> <n>in our sacks</n>
23: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> שָׁל֨וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>Peace</n> לָכֶ֜ם אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּירָ֗אוּ <sup>3372 </sup> <n>[be] to you fear</n> אֱלֹ֨הֵיכֶ֜ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>not your God</n> וֵֽאלֹהֵ֤י <sup>430 </sup> <n>and the God</n> אֲבִיכֶם֙ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of your father</n> נָתַ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> לָכֶ֤ם מַטְמוֹן֙ <sup>4301 </sup> <n>you treasure</n> בְּאַמְתְּחֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>572 </sup> <n>in your sacks</n> כַּסְפְּכֶ֖ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>your money</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>I had</n> אֵלָ֑י <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> וַיּוֹצֵ֥א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>And he brought</n> אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <sup>8095 </sup> <n>Simeon</n>
24: וַיָּבֵ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>brought</n> הָאִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And the man</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>the men</n> בֵּ֣יתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>into Joseph's</n> וַיִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and gave</n> מַ֙יִם֙ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>[them] water</n> וַיִּרְחֲצ֣וּ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>and they washed</n> רַגְלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>7272 </sup> <n>their feet</n> וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and he gave</n> מִסְפּ֖וֹא <sup>4554 </sup> <n>provender</n> לַחֲמֹֽרֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>2543 </sup> <n>their asses</n>
25: וַיָּכִ֙ינוּ֙ <sup>3559 </sup> <n>And they made ready</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּנְחָ֔ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>the present</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בּ֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <sup>6672 </sup> <n>at noon</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>for they heard</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שָׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יֹ֥אכְלוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>that they should eat</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n>
26: וַיָּבֹ֤א <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> יוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And when Joseph</n> הַבַּ֔יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>home</n> וַיָּבִ֥יאּוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they brought</n> ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמִּנְחָ֥ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>him the present</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בְּיָדָ֖ם <sup>3027 </sup> <n>which [was] in their hand</n> הַבָּ֑יְתָה <sup>1004 </sup> <n>into the house</n> וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>and bowed</n> ל֖וֹ אָֽרְצָה׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>themselves to him to the earth</n>
27: וַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>And he asked</n> לָהֶם֙ לְשָׁל֔וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>them of [their] welfare</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הֲשָׁל֛וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>well</n> אֲבִיכֶ֥ם <sup>1 </sup> <n>[Is] your father</n> הַזָּקֵ֖ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>the old man</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of whom</n> אֲמַרְתֶּ֑ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>of whom ye spake</n> הַעוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> חָֽי׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>age</n>
28: וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they answered</n> שָׁל֛וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>[is] in good health</n> לְעַבְדְּךָ֥ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>Thy servant</n> לְאָבִ֖ינוּ <sup>1 </sup> <n>our father</n> עוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is still</n> חָ֑י <sup>2416 </sup> <n>he [is] yet alive</n> וַֽיִּקְּד֖וּ <sup>6915 </sup> <n>And they bowed down their heads</n> [וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּֽוּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>bow down</n> ק)
29: וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And he lifted up</n> עֵינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>his eyes</n> וַיַּ֞רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and saw</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בִּנְיָמִ֣ין <sup>1144 </sup> <n>Benjamin</n> אָחִיו֮ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>son</n> אִמּוֹ֒ <sup>517 </sup> <n>his mother's</n> וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הֲזֶה֙ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>is this</n> אֲחִיכֶ֣ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>brother</n> הַקָּטֹ֔ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>[Is] this your younger</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>of whom</n> אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <sup>559 </sup> <n>of whom ye spake</n> אֵלָ֑י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>unto me? And he said</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> יָחְנְךָ֖ <sup>2603 </sup> <n>be gracious</n> בְּנִֽי׃ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto thee my son</n>
30: וַיְמַהֵ֣ר <sup>4116 </sup> <n>made haste</n> יוֹסֵ֗ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִכְמְר֤וּ <sup>3648 </sup> <n>did yearn</n> רַחֲמָיו֙ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>for his bowels</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>over</n> אָחִ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>upon his brother</n> וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and he sought</n> לִבְכּ֑וֹת <sup>1058 </sup> <n>[where] to weep</n> וַיָּבֹ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>and he entered</n> הַחַ֖דְרָה <sup>2315 </sup> <n>into [his] chamber</n> וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> שָֽׁמָּה׃ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n>
31: וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>And he washed</n> פָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>his face</n> וַיֵּצֵ֑א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>and went out</n> וַיִּ֨תְאַפַּ֔ק <sup>662 </sup> <n>and refrained</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>himself and said</n> שִׂ֥ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>Set on</n> לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n>
32: וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And they set on</n> ל֛וֹ לְבַדּ֖וֹ <sup>905 </sup> <n>himself</n> וְלָהֶ֣ם לְבַדָּ֑ם <sup>905 </sup> <n>themselves</n> וְלַמִּצְרִ֞ים <sup>4713 </sup> <n>for him by himself and for them by themselves and for the Egyptians</n> הָאֹכְלִ֤ים <sup>398 </sup> <n>which did eat</n> אִתּוֹ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>by</n> לְבַדָּ֔ם <sup>905 </sup> <n>themselves</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> לֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יוּכְל֜וּן <sup>3201 </sup> <n>might</n> הַמִּצְרִ֗ים <sup>4713 </sup> <n>with him by themselves because the Egyptians</n> לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>not eat</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָֽעִבְרִים֙ <sup>5680 </sup> <n>with the Hebrews</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> תוֹעֵבָ֥ה <sup>8441 </sup> <n>for that [is] an abomination</n> הִ֖וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4713 </sup> <n>the Egyptians</n>
33: וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>And they sat</n> לְפָנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before him</n> הַבְּכֹר֙ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>the firstborn</n> כִּבְכֹ֣רָת֔וֹ <sup>1062 </sup> <n>according to his birthright</n> וְהַצָּעִ֖יר <sup>6810 </sup> <n>and the youngest</n> כִּצְעִרָת֑וֹ <sup>6812 </sup> <n>according to his youth</n> וַיִּתְמְה֥וּ <sup>8539 </sup> <n>marvelled</n> הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> אִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>one</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>at another</n>
34: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And he took</n> מַשְׂאֹ֜ת <sup>4864 </sup> <n>[and sent] messes</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> פָּנָיו֮ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>unto them from before him</n> אֲלֵהֶם֒ <sup>413 </sup> <n>as</n> וַתֵּ֜רֶב <sup>7235 </sup> <n>so much as</n> מַשְׂאַ֧ת <sup>4864 </sup> <n>mess</n> בִּנְיָמִ֛ן <sup>1144 </sup> <n>but Benjamin's</n> מִמַּשְׂאֹ֥ת <sup>4864 </sup> <n>portions</n> כֻּלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> חָמֵ֣שׁ <sup>2568 </sup> <n>was five</n> יָד֑וֹת <sup>3027 </sup> <n>times</n> וַיִּשְׁתּ֥וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>any of theirs And they drank</n> וַֽיִּשְׁכְּר֖וּ <sup>7937 </sup> <n>and were merry</n> עִמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n>
